name: d3-timer
description: An efficient queue capable of managing thousands of concurrent animations.

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && d3-bundler -n timer -o build/timer.js && uglifyjs build/timer.js -c -m -o build/timer.min.js && rm -f build/timer.zip && zip -j build/timer.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/timer.js build/timer.min.js
